title: Sion, So when is it going to be nerfed?
body: Sion has been the most OP champion after remake , It's passive does not have a cooldown and it does about 200-400damage per hit. Sion's damage is outrageous even without any damage items , all it needs is warmog and GG

replies.body:
I hope you're joking even though I didn't actually laugh or smile, just kinda sitting here and stare at this post and be like "errrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr...........".

A champion who has to die every single time just to be somewhat OP for 2 seconds (which is useless in front of any cc btw) while feeding enemy team 3-5 man isn't what we would exactly call "Overpowered".

And Warmog is actually one of the weakest tank item by itself in the game at the moment so I don't know what that is about.
When Sion dies, either run or CC him.
Or just be a man and fight him as well!
